heading: The Design-Centric Architect
subheading: Bridging the gap between engineering and business ROI.
bio: I have spent 7 years professionalizing my approach to software, including a deep 5-year focus on the React ecosystem and 2 years mastering Next.js. My background as a Graphic Designer and Content Writer gives me a rare 'multipotentialite' edge: I don't just write functional code, I deliver pixel-perfect products with user empathy.

For the past 5 years, I have architected modular UI systems and high-scale applications for international clients. I am known for my ability to hit a stride quickly in ambiguous environments, turning evolving requirements into production-ready solutions.

My engineering philosophy is rooted in performance and scalability. Whether I am leading a distributed team or optimizing a complex B2B dashboard, I ensure every technical decision supports long-term business growth and a 30% average boost in speed.

highlights.title: React & Next.js Specialist
highlights.description: 5 years of dedicated React experience, including 2 years of building server-side rendered apps with Next.js.

highlights.title: Full Lifecycle Leadership
highlights.description: 7 years in the industry has taught me to manage projects from initial discovery to final cloud deployment.

highlights.title: Performance Optimization
highlights.description: Expert in Core Web Vitals, achieving a 30% average performance lift through advanced architectural patterns.
